user.title: Azan Audio
user.description: The integration includes two built-in azan recordings (Full length and Short length). Choose which variant to use per prayer, or provide a custom YouTube URL or local MP3 path (e.g. media/azan.mp3) to override the defaults.

data_description.sound_fajr: Choose Full, Short, or Custom audio for Fajr. If Custom, uses the Fajr audio URL.
data_description.sound_sunrise: Choose Full, Short, or Custom audio for Sunrise. If Custom, uses the main Azan URL.
data_description.sound_dhuhr: Choose Full, Short, or Custom audio for Dhuhr.
data_description.sound_asr: Choose Full, Short, or Custom audio for Asr.
data_description.sound_maghrib: Choose Full, Short, or Custom audio for Maghrib.
data_description.sound_isha: Choose Full, Short, or Custom audio for Isha.
data_description.azan_url: YouTube URL, direct URL, or local filepath (eg: `/media/adhan.mp3`) for the main azan audio
data_description.fajr_azan_url: YouTube URL, direct URL, or local filepath (eg: `/media/adhan.mp3`) specifically for the Fajr azan audio

playback_mode.title: Playback Device
playback_mode.description: Choose how you want to play the azan audio.

media_player.title: Media Player
media_player.description: Select the smart speaker or media player to use for azan playback.

android_vlc.title: Android Settings
android_vlc.description: Configure the Android phone settings for VLC playback.

data_description.external_url: The external URL your phone can reach Home Assistant at (e.g., your-ha.duckdns.org)
data_description.notify_service: Home Assistant notify service name (e.g., mobile_app_your_phone)

prayer_source.title: Prayer Times Source
prayer_source.description: Choose where to fetch prayer times from.

location.title: Location
location.description: Configure location for prayer time calculations.

schedule.title: Schedule & Prayers
schedule.description: Configure which prayers to play azan for and the offset for Sunrise

data_description.offset_minutes: Play the Sunrise azan this many minutes before sunrise. Range: 0–45. This offset only applies to Sunrise; other prayers play at their scheduled times.
